channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BermudAir focuses on reliability, growth as it marks one year of flights

item.title: Gulf Air eyes US flights, will add free Wi-Fi and improved food as it upgrades service
item.description: Bahrain’s Gulf Air plans to upgrade some aspects of its inflight offerings next year as it eyes a return to the U.S. amid its 75th anniversary celebra...

item.title: New benefits coming for AAdvantage and World of Hyatt elite members — at the expense of reciprocal earning privileges
item.description: American Airlines AAdvantage and World of Hyatt launched a partnership in 2019, offering reciprocal benefits for elite members in each program. Since ...

item.title: How I used points and miles to book business-class flights to Madagascar for my honeymoon

item.title: Saudi startup Riyadh Air confident in 2025 launch, mum on plans for US flights
